channel.title: CVE Feed for Pdfcrowd -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pdfcrowd -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-33684|2024-04-29T08:17:43.039Z -- Pdfcrowd -- Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Pdfcrowd Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd: from n/a through 3.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-31930|2024-04-11T12:24:44.844Z -- Pdfcrowd -- Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Pdfcrowd Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd: from n/a through 3.2.1 .

item.title: CVE-2024-35649|2024-06-04T14:17:06.757Z -- Pdfcrowd -- Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Pdfcrowd Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd: from n/a through 3.2.3.
